Suggested Usage: 5%-7% | Diacetyl Free! | - OOOFlavors.com
__________________________________________________
**9/17/2017** 

SF Test: **7%** | 60/40 | Wasp Nano | 316L SS Fused Clapton | Japanese Org.Cotton

 


‚ñ∫First Impressions

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle Test | Smell / Taste:** 
--- Light Corn with subtle Bread Note on the back (mostly bread) 

--- Very light neutral Corn Flavor & Bread "plain bread" Flavor ‚Ä¢ Sweet

--- Note of Banana?
_________________________________________________
**9/24/017 (1 Week Steep ‚úî )**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma**:  Hint of Corn but Aroma Similar to DX Banana Cream (TPA) |  Moderately High Aroma Intensity  


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Mod. Sweet | Mix of a White Corn / Candied Banana Flavor / Creamy "Bread" = Cornmeal / Flour combo Flavor Not easily Identifiable 
--- Hint of a Vanilla Flavor


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Pleasant Soft Aroma | Aroma & Taste Similar to that of a Very Light & balanced "Banana" Bread
Corn Flavor - Authenticity Lacking 

---- Light. Body | Overall Smooth | Slight Dryness ( Bread? ) & Sharpness

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Light Vanilla

‚Ä¢ Not a Recognizable "Corn" Bread Flavor @ 1 week steep
__________________________________________________
**10/01/2017 (2 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:**  An Amalgamation of a White Corn & DX Banana Cream | Slight ‚Üì In Aroma Intensity - Mod.


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Sweetness & Smoothness Unchanged ‚úì  | Corn / Banana w Cream - Dominant
 
----|  "Bread" / Slight Vanilla taste = Same

‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Slight ‚Üë to Bready, Yeasty, & Dry Aroma & Flavor | Lighter Flavor Intensity 

----| Cream Banana Flavor & Hint of Corn wrapped in a Light Yeast or vice versa

----| Slight ‚Üë in Body = Mod | Overall Smooth Mouth Feel with Light - Mild Dryness (Bread/ Yeast?) 

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Vanilla Note in Vape = Gone ‚úì

‚Ä¢ "Corn Bread" Flavor Imitation: Lacking & Not A Close Imitation ‚úì-
_________________________________________________
**10/09/2017 ( 3 Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle:** Unchanged from Wk 2 ‚úì

---|  Mod. Aroma of "DX Banana Cream" with a Hint of Corn  | Aroma Intensity - Mod.  


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Overall Unchanged ‚úì

----| Semi Sweet "Banana" w/ "Corn" & Hint of Cream & Vanilla

----| "Bread" Flavor not easily Identified


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Overall Unchanged ‚úì 

----|  Bread/Yeast mixed with Hint of a Semi Sweet Banana``Light "Corn" | Flv Intensity Mod.Light

----|  Lighter Body | Semi-Drying Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Light Tartness & Light Banana Flv

‚Ä¢ + Additional Corn / Grain or Bread flavor for "grit"

‚Ä¢ Uses: Bakeries & Desserts

Estimate 

‚ñ∫ Usage:   3 - 4% min  | 5 - 6% med   | 7 - 8% max

Mix: 5 - 6%
